channel.title: Ima seller, not a buyer
channel.description:
is there a way i can make a shopkeeper that buys items from you for a certain amount of gp, but you cannot buy items from him
Thanks

item.title: Ima seller, not a buyer
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Zezerex, post:3, topic:286746”][quote author=HiddenPker link=topic=379208.msg2851862#msg2851862 date=1246578121]
yes… npc 520 lol is general store.
[/quote]will the item appear in the store? can i edit the amount that the item sells for?[/quote]
you would need to make a whole new shopshandler for this. NOTE - even pro servers still dont have the items appearing in shops 100% yet.
another note - … alot of server sell for same buy price.

Read full topic
